scripts.pull: rm -rf package; npm pack @fortawesome/$PKG-svg-icons && gunzip -c fortawesome-*.tgz | tar xf - && rm -rf fortawesome-*.tgz && mkdir -p dist && mv package dist/$NAME
scripts.download: rm -rf dist; PKG=pro-solid NAME=solid npm run pull && PKG=pro-regular NAME=regular npm run pull && PKG=pro-light NAME=light npm run pull && PKG=pro-thin NAME=thin npm run pull && PKG=pro-duotone NAME=duotone npm run pull && PKG=sharp-solid NAME=sharp-solid npm run pull && tar -zcvf fa.tar.gz dist
scripts.build: rm -rf build; tsx src/build.ts && tsc -p tsconfig.build.json && gunzip -c fa.tar.gz | tar xvf -
